episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

-1.plot:

 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: A Twisted Affair

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Alex takes a pregnancy test. Randal is having an affair with Alex, but he finds out that her husband Brad had a vasectomy. Marcie and maybe Randal want to have children but they're having a hard time. Esperanza deals with her ex-husband Eddie who wants to control her life. Kelly wants to buy a house for her and her boyfriend.

2.title: Shots Fired

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Brad suspects Alex of cheating. Lushion tries to ask Eddie for a job at the police station. Marci tries to become one of the girls, but she feels the group are distant towards her. Kelly views a house and buys it, only to find out Travis could be hiding something from her.

3.title: Alex Is Pregnant

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Esperanza questions Eddie. Meanwhile Brad suspects Alex of having an affair. Natalie calls the parole board to get her son Joey out of prison. Kelly and the girls move her things into the new house.

4.title: The Colombian

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Natalie meets a parole officer regarding Joey, Randal presses Brad about why he is avoiding him and Brad tells him Alex is pregnant. Esperanza has Colombian connections and fears Eddie is in danger. Travis returns from Haiti.

5.title: The War Begins

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Joey returns home. Randal tries to make Alex jealous, meanwhile Alex tries to confirm that Brad is the father of her unborn child. Travis has some news for Kelly that she isn't expecting. Eddie continues to act irrationally.

6.title: Game Night

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Eddie investigates Julius. Lushion finally gets an interview at the station and Natalie is encouraged to get Joey a job at the burger joint. A games night at Brad and Alex's leads to some awkward moments with Randal and Marcie.

7.title: After Heartbreak

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Kelly makes plans to sell her house; Marcie and Brad become more suspicious of their spouses. Eddie is lured into a meeting with Julius' father; Joey makes a big mistake at work.

8.title: 14 Weeks

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Alex finds out that she's further along in her pregnancy than she originally thought; the burger joint is robbed and all fingers are pointing at Joey.

9.title: Peppa

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Marcie finds out Randall is sneaking around with a woman named "Peppa" . Eddie attempts to take on the Kartel.

10.title: Look Closely

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Kelly discovers who Peppa is. Alex is desperate for help to end the affair. Travis makes a decision about Justice and Eddie makes plans to retaliate against Julius. Kelly tells Marcie to 'look closely' to figure out who Peppa is.

11.title: The Lady Next Door

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: Marcie knows the truth about the affair and makes a scene at Brad's birthday party.

12.title: Girlfriends

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: Alex's affair with Randal has been exposed. Kelly, Natalie and Esperanza try to comfort her.

13.title: Fatherless Boys

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: Kelly's son Justice reveals that his father doesn't call or talk with him anymore. Joey has an interview at a dangerous chemical plant, which Natalie disapproves of.

14.title: Who Knew

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: Brad seeks revenge against Randal and questions the girls about the affair between Alex and Randal

15.title: Marcie and Brad

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

15.plot: Marcie gives Randal divorce papers. She tells Brad that she wants to have sex with him to get back at Randal and Alex.

16.title: Whose Baby

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

16.plot: Marcie and Brad find out they have more in common than they expected. Alex experiences contraction-like symptoms. Brad demands that Alex get a paternity test from the doctor.

17.title: The Randal Connection

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

17.plot: Randall tells Marcie he's the father of Alex's unborn child. Alex and Brad's kids see him sleeping on the couch and question their parents. Eddie feels uneasy, so he tries to make things right with Lushion.

18.title: The Debt

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

18.plot: Edward is targeted in an act of revenge for taking money from Quan. Marcie confronts Alex about her sexual history. Esperanza gets a visit from Randall's lawyer.

19.title: Nine PM

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

19.plot: Eddie is rushed to the hospital after getting shot in the last episode. While struggling for his life, Esperanza is distraught but things worsen when Eddie's wife shows up. Travis comes to Kelly's job.

20.title: Alex's Baby

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

20.plot: Marcie tells the neighbors about the Randall-Alex affair and Brad threatens Randall. Alex goes into labor, The episode ends when the doctor insists on seeing Brad before he sees the baby.

21.title: Miss Louise

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

21.plot: Alex is in hospital facing the harsh reality of her situation, Brad is shocked and angered. Her husbands affair has taken it's toll on Marcie and things only get worse for her when Randal's mum turns up. Eddies corrupt ways escalate.

22.title: The Beauty That Is

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

22.plot: Alex is still recovering in the hospital and her friends come to visit, they are shocked when Alex refuses to see her baby. Randall comes home to find his mother there and is pressured by Marcie to get her to leave.

23.title: The Painter

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

23.plot: Alex struggles to accept who the father of her baby is and still refuses to care for him and take her medicine. Brad is still angry and swears to Alex that he will remind her every day of her mistake to cheat.

24.title: Blonde Hair, Blue Eyes

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

24.plot: Tensions between Marcie and her mother-in-law come to a head and the truth of the affair is nearly exposed. Randal pays Alex a visit in hospital. Meanwhile, angry Brad plots revenge to get back at Alex and Randal.

25.title: The Shed

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

25.plot: Kelly stumbles across Brad and Alex's tryst in Randal's shed and it isn't long before Randal sees them too. Eddie is trying to cover his tracks after Ben's shooting and has a run in with the new rookie Pete.

26.title: Being a Woman

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

26.plot: Randal falls apart after discovering Brad and Marcie together in his shed. Natalie discovers her son and Faun together in the burger joint. Eddie makes a surprise visit to Brad's office and is shocked to hear of Brad's extreme plan.

27.title: Joey & Faun

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

27.plot: Kelly helps her neighbor's son through his grief.

28.title: The Tape

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

28.plot: Eddie and Ben plot to get the surveillance tape.

29.title: He's Beautiful

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

29.plot: Alex pointed the finger at Kelly for keeping secrets.

30.title: Time for a Cigar

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

30.plot: Because of his betrayal, Brad taunts Randal.

31.title: Out of Control

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

31.plot: Marcie has had enough of the bitter war of vengeance with Randal.

32.title: Mortal & Fifth

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

32.plot: A horrible ambush ends in catastrophe.

13.title: The Last Word

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: Randal confronts his wife about her infidelity.

14.title: Backfired

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: Kelly does her best to protect Alex.

15.title: Randal's Wicked Web

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

15.plot: Randal comes for Alex and Brad.

16.title: A Mother's Love

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

16.plot: Alex realizes the debts of Randal's evil.

17.title: Betting on Tina

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

17.plot: Eddie finds that a nurse is his most formidable opponent.

18.title: The Brown Paper Bag

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

18.plot: Lushion searches high and low for a piece of evidence.

19.title: For Pete

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

19.plot: Lushion takes a stand against corruption.

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: In a fit of desperation, Alex leaves home and takes matters into her own hands.

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Kelly discovers Louise's body at Randal's house.

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

5.title: An Unlikely Suspect

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: A crime shocks the town of Maxine; the police identify a suspect.

6.title: The Power of Love

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Police interrogate their top suspect in the crime that has shocked the town.

7.title: The Wages of Sin

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Pete has a flashback about who shot him.

8.title: Keeping Watch

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Edward tries to wake Louise while she is unconscious in an effort to see what she knows about Brad; Lushion scolds an agent who wasn't keeping tabs on Pete's room.

9.title: A Room for You

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Eddie sets his sights on Marcie in the disappearance of Randal.

10.title: Every Minute Counts

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Marcie learns life-altering news and her life will never be the same.

11.title: Rusty's Brand of Justice

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: Alex begs her father for her baby.

12.title: A Neighborhood in Crisis

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: In the mid-season spring premiere, Kelly learns the shocking whereabouts of her neighbor Ramsey.

13.title: Su Ling Mai

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: Pete takes on an alias to keep himself out of Edward's grasp.

14.title: A Fatal Attraction

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: Travis loses his mind and becomes a crazed predator. Alex and Randall face off in court.

15.title: The Missing Person

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

15.plot: The police are searching for the missing Andrew. Alex reveals shocking news.

16.title: The Mailman

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

16.plot: Kelly panics when she learns the crime Travis has committed.

17.title: Tippa Haynes

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

17.plot: Randal questions the paternity of Alex's baby. Marcie grapples of telling Brad about her pregnancy.

18.title: The Party Just Arrived

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

18.plot: Dianne confronts and bullies Kelly with outrageous demands, while Randal warns Natalie that Lushion is cheating on her.

19.title: Don't Lose Your Deposit

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

19.plot: Louise gives Marcie advice about Brad.

20.title: No One Is Safe

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

20.plot: Kelly finds herself in an all-to-familiar predicament with a man she just can't get rid of.

21.title: Angry Men

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

21.plot: Travis acts on his vengeful impulses.

22.title: Sound the Alarm

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

22.plot: Kelly learns a new way to protect herself from Travis, Alex is finally granted custody of her baby, Eddie gets taken down.it off ends with a gunshot going off in Kelly's house while Esperanza,Kelly and Alex's kids are inside.

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Kelly is in legal trouble that threatens her freedom. Randal continues to go after Marcie and Brad.

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

episode of.title: If Loving You Is Wrong (TV Series 2014– )

imdb.title: If Loving You Is Wrong
plot: The show follows the relationships of a group of husbands and wives that live and love on the same street.::Dillon Belisle
synopsis: If Loving You is Wrong" follows "the relationships of a group of husbands and wives that live and love on the same street.
